text: U.S. Route 56 (US 56) is an east-west United States highway. It goes for in the Midwestern United States. The highway's eastern endpoint is at U.S. Route 71 in Kansas City, Missouri. Its western endpoint is at Interstate 25 Business in Springer, New Mexico. Much of it follows the Santa Fe Trail. ==Route description== The highway goes through New Mexico, Oklahoma, Kansas, and Missouri. It also touches a corner of Texas at a small road junction near the New Mexico/Oklahoma border. ==References== ==Other websites== * Endpoints of U.S. Highway 56 * Kansas Highway Maps: Current , Historic , KDOT Category:U.S. Highways Category:Geography of Kansas Category:Geography of Oklahoma Category:Geography of New Mexico
title: U.S. Route 56
